steps.name: User enters "Scranton, PA" in permanent address
User should be able to see created teacher displayed in the UI
Tester should be able to verify created teacher in the Database
User click on threedots button on Christian teacher
User edit "01/01/2020" in joining date calendar
User edit "01/01/2001" in birth date calendar
User should see the edited profile displayed in the UI
Tester should be able to veryfy the edited Teacher in DataBase
User clicks on drop down toggle
User sees Delete Employee pop up
User should not see the deleted teacher in the UI
Tester should not see the deleted teacher in the Database
User should be able to "<submit>" it.
User clicks on three dots of Chuck profile
User clicks edit button in dropdown box
User should be able to see edited student displayed in the UI
Tester should be able to verify edited student in Database

elements.name: As a User I should able to create student

steps.name: User enter "123 chicago street" present address
User enter "1223 chicago street" in street
User click to the Submit button
User should be able to see created student displayed in the UI
Tester should be able to verify created student in the Database
User clicks to Add Teacher field
User types "Grace" in to first name field
User types "Kelly " in to last name field
User types  "gkell@gmail.com" in to email field
User types "3/2/2008" in to join date field
User types "123456" in to password field
User types "World Wars" in to subject field
User types "123456778" in to mobile number field
User selects "Social Studies" from Department dropdown
User types "2/3/1980" in to Birth date field
User types "0" in to Salary field
User selects "12" in to batch field
User types "3" in to section field
User types "123 Main St IL " in to permanent address field
User should be able to verify that her name is displayed in the teacher list
Tester should be able to verify the new teacher's name is on the database
